name: Training Shoes
description: They dont just make you faster, they make you regret not moving.

name: Training Buddy
description: They believe in you more than you believe in yourself. It’s terrifying.

name: Supplements
description: Mystery powders and pills. You don’t know what they do. You just take them now.

name: Athleisure
description: Stylish. Functional. Expensive enough to guilt you into exercising.

name: Gym Membership
description: You walk in with good intentions. You crawl out in pain.

name: Fitness Tracker
description: Congratulations! You closed your rings! Now do it again.

name: Sports
description: You’ve started using words like ‘cardio’ and ‘aerobic threshold’ unironically.

name: Heartbreak
description: Calories burn hotter when fueled by pain.

name: Personal Trainer
description: They demand push-ups at random intervals. You obey without question.

name: Home Gym Setup
description: Your living room is now a shrine to hypertrophy.

name: Marathons
description: The runner’s high is your baseline now

name: Decathlons
description: Ten events, one champion. You are now a human Swiss Army knife of athleticism.

name: Olympic Training
description: Your life is just eating, training, and recovering. And you love it.

name: World Record Achievements
description: Congratulations. Your name is now in a book next to ‘longest fingernails’ guy.

name: Gene Editing
description: Fats and carbs burn themselves out of fear. You are pure muscle now.

name: Biomechanical Augmentations
description: You’re mostly metal now, but your VO2 max is off the charts.

name: Superpowers
description: Gravity? Outdated. Limits? A joke. Strength? Infinite.

name: Muscle Worshipers
description: The masses now gather to admire your physique. Gains fueled by admiration.

name: Post-Human Evolution
description: The concept of ‘exercise’ is meaningless to you now. Your body simply is.

name: Physical Transcendence
description: You have ascended. You no longer train; you exist as pure fitness itself.
